pages.text: The $(item)Fisherman's Strainer/$ can sometimes pick up $(item)washed hide/$, which you can process into leather products.$(p)To create $(item)tannin/$, place a bucket of water into a barrel with 4 leaves, then cover it with a lid.$(p)The hide can be soaked in the tannin, then left to dry in the sun on a $(item)tanning rack/$.
